Inauguration des universités & Clôture d: Inauguration of the universities & Closing of the Challenge II
C’est dans une ambiance inédite, connect: It was in an unprecedented atmosphere, connected and still as warm despite the distance, that the 2nd edition of the “Challenge II: Smart Applications & Automation Process” took place
Ce challenge récompense: This challenge rewards the best initiatives, in many fields: intelligent technology (smart technology), Internet of things (Internet Of Things IOT), Robotics, Artificial Intelligence (Artificial Intelligence), Computing ...
Nous fêtons la cérémonie de clôture du C: We are celebrating the closing ceremony of Challenge II on Saturday June 05, 2021 at the el Ghazela technological center.
Tous les participants: All participants are invited by UM on June 05, 2021 for a second oral presentation. Each candidate will have 15 minutes to present their innovation to an audience and a jury of international experts. The presentation can be in English or French.
